Amplitude.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Increase the beam range of Oppressor Mines by {scale=20|20}%

Beam Me Up.card_desc: [Transporter] Increases the flight speed of Transporter by {scale=10|10}%

Bob and Weave.card_desc: [Transporter]  Increase your movement speed by {scale=27|27}% for 2s after deploying or teleporting through Transporter.

Calibrate.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your Carbine Rifle lowers the cooldown of Transporter by {scale=0.12|0.12}s.

Generator.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] The Cooldown of Oppressor Mine is reduced by {scale=1.225|1.225}s.

Lie in Wait.card_desc: [Armor] After 2s of standing still, regenerate {scale=1|1} ammo every 2 seconds.

Octoppressor.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Oppressor mines affect up to {scale=1|1} more enemies

Open Season.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Hitting an enemy with a fully charged shot restores {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Prodigy.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Increase your movement speed while scoped by {scale=25|25}%

Quick Scope.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Reduce the time it takes to scope in and scope out by {scale=20|20}%

Restore.card_desc: [Transporter] Heal for {scale=10|10}% of maximum health after teleporting to your Transporter beacon.

Steady Aim.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Hitting a fully charged shot will cause your next fully charged shot within 7s to deal 30% more damage.

True Grit.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Hitting an enemy with a fully charged shot heals you for {scale=100|100}.

Well Stocked.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Activating Oppressor Mine generates {scale=3|3} Ammo.
